channel.title: Need a void
channel.description: Ok this isnt relay for my rs2 server, but for my rs2 servers chat system, i dont want people using yell so instead i have a special chat server. I am not good with reading and writing stuff to files... I need a void that will write a givin var to a file, then a , then another var, so like "user,pass". then i need a way to read that information and assign user to a var and assign pass to a var so that when they try a pre existing user name, it will tell them to enter in a pass, and if its not the pass right next to the username in the file...well... it doesnt work.

i dont want a gui i like it being basic, all it is is a telnet chat server lol

item.title: Need a void
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

lol ok.
Points:

  1. I dont want people using yell on my server, but i sitll want them to be able to talk.
  2. I have a chat server ive been working on so they can use it, but
  3. I dont know how to make a void that can read and write from a file
  4. So every time you log in you choose a new Username
    I am going to add paswords to it but it doesnt save any info to a file, so i need a way to save. I want to have it save their username, password, and ip to a file, in like a list, one user per line

So i want the file to be like
Tking,pass,ip
dez,pass,ip
i already have the vars for username and ip, and im making one for pass now.

Read full topic
